name: Crazy Kings
description:
The popular CCG meets Tower Defense game that has 1M+ downloads worldwide! Challenge your strategy in 500+ FREE levels! Fantastic Comic-Style Art, Over 90+ Collectible Cards, Epic Daily Quests & Weekly Tournaments, Customize Your Own Hero, and Hire Your Friends to Ally with You!

Command your troops and loot your way through hundreds of levels of card game wars and build your very own army in this epic CCG. Combine hundreds of items to create bigger, better and badder towers. Featuring hundreds of awesome tower defense levels, have you got what it takes to defend your kingdom from the Crazy Kings? Save the world in this popular TD adventure!


|| CRAZY KINGS || GAME FEATURES ||

• 500+ FREE LEVELS TO CHALLENGE YOUR STRATEGY
Hundreds of awesome levels set across snowy tundra, arid desert, rolling hills and more!

• 90+ COLLECTIBLE CARDS - TOWER DEFENSE CCG
Get hooked with brain-busting strategy and super-addictive card collecting gameplay fun!

• 7 ESSENTIAL TOWERS & 12+ SPECIALIZED TOWERS
Every tower has varying ranges for attacks and unique abilities! Upgrade to defend!

• 18 DIVERSE SPELL ABILITIES AT YOUR COMMAND
From powerful summons, to hero-healing charms, customize your awesome deck to battle!

• 30+ EQUIPMENT TO CUSTOMIZE YOUR OWN AVATAR
From Helmet, Armor, Shield, Boots, Accessory to Weapon, YOUR choice will decide your avatar's abilities, such as attack damage, movement speed, defence and even health regeneration!

• UPGRADE 20+ UNIQUE HEROES TO ALLY WITH YOU
Win new items with every victory, and make your hero the biggest and badest!

• OVER 100+ BADDIES TO BASH & BOSS FIGHTS
Fight dozens of enemy types, from Minotaurs, to Undead and even feathered fiends!

• BUILD AND UPGRADE YOUR CARDS
Level up your battle deck from everyday defenses, right up to epic giant dragons!

• FANTASTIC EYE-CATCHING COMIC-STYLE ART DESIGN
The wink-nudge charm visual experience you’ll come back for more!

• WIN PRIZES IN QUESTS AND TOURNAMENTS
Join millions in daily battles and weekly tournaments for awesome rewards & endless fun!
